names.pinyin: shou wu yan shou dan jia jian
names.english: modified polygonum multiflorum extend longevity elixir
names.commonEnglish: Modified Polygonum Multiflorum Extend Longevity Elixir

actions: Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, nourishes the Blood and nourishes Jing.
With Sang Ji Sheng, tonifies Kidney Yin and Liver Blood to nourish the sinews and bones and treat dizziness and blurred vision.
Anchors Liver Yang, calms the Spirit, benefits Yin, nourishes the Kidneys and augments the Liver.
Invigorates the Blood, expels Blood Stasis and nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin.
With Du Zhong, for low back and extremity pain and weakness due to Bi pain or Kidney Deficiency.
Nourishes Heart Yin, tonifies Liver Blood and calms the Spirit.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood and nourishes Yin.
With Niu Xi, powerfully clears Deficiency Fire Blazing Upward.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Blood and Yin.
With Ju Hua, for Liver and Kidney Deficiency with Jing and Blood unable to rise and nourish the eyes.
Tonifies the Kidneys and Liver, aids the smooth flow of Qi and Blood and lowers blood pressure.
Calms the Liver, clears the eyes, calms Liver Yang, promotes the movement of Heart Qi and Blood and stimulates Blood circulation.
Nourishes and Reinforces the Liver and Kidneys

symptoms: Low back and knees sore and painful
